description: The Mogollon culture of the American Southwest (300 BCE - 1450 CE) encoded planetary geometry into their cliff dwellings, kivas, petroglyphs, and ceramic designs. The Mimbres pottery tradition in particular contains some of the most sophisticated astronomical imagery in the ancient world. Their structures at Chaco Canyon, Casa Grande, Mesa Verde, and along the Gila River were precisely aligned to solstices, equinoxes, and lunar standstills — the same planetary angular relationships encoded by every other tradition on Earth.
source_tradition: Mogollon / Mimbres / Ancestral Puebloan / Sinagua / Hohokam, American Southwest (300 BCE - 1450 CE), inheriting astronomical knowledge from earlier Archaic traditions dating to 8000+ BCE

symbols.name: Sun Dagger (Fajada Butte)
symbols.meaning: Solstice marker — dagger of light pierces the spiral petroglyph
symbols.astronomical_alignment: Summer solstice light dagger bisects spiral petroglyph at solar noon

symbols.name: Pueblo Bonito Great House
symbols.meaning: Cardinal alignment — the great house faces true south with perfect E-W symmetry wall
symbols.astronomical_alignment: Central wall aligned true N-S, equinox sunrise through eastern doorway

symbols.name: Casa Rinconada Great Kiva
symbols.meaning: Circular ceremonial chamber — 19m diameter, aligned to cardinal and solstice points
symbols.astronomical_alignment: 28 niches = lunar month, solstice light enters through NE portal

symbols.name: Chimney Rock Lunar Standstill
symbols.meaning: Twin rock pillars frame the northern lunar standstill moonrise every 18.6 years
symbols.astronomical_alignment: Northern major lunar standstill — Moon rises between twin pillars

symbols.name: Mimbres Fish Bowl
symbols.meaning: Twin fish circling — Pisces duality, the dance of opposites in the cosmic ocean
symbols.astronomical_alignment: Fish motif encodes Venus-Neptune opposition — two worlds circling each other

symbols.name: Mimbres Rabbit Bowl
symbols.meaning: Rabbit on the Moon — the lunar hare seen across cultures (Aztec Tochtli, Chinese Moon Rabbit)
symbols.astronomical_alignment: Moon-Venus trine — lunar fertility and beauty, the rabbit that lives on the Moon

symbols.name: Mimbres Bighorn Sheep Bowl
symbols.meaning: Mountain ram with spiral horns — Aries force, Mars energy encoded in ceramic
symbols.astronomical_alignment: Mars-Sun sextile — the warrior energy of Aries, controlled aggression

symbols.name: Mimbres Thunderbird Bowl
symbols.meaning: The thunderbird brings lightning — Jupiter's bolt, expansion through power
symbols.astronomical_alignment: Jupiter-Sun conjunction — maximum expansion, the thunderbird's moment of power

symbols.name: Mimbres Plumed Serpent Bowl
symbols.meaning: Feathered serpent — same as Quetzalcoatl, the Morning Star Venus, encoded 1000 miles north
symbols.astronomical_alignment: Venus quintile Sun — the sacred 72° geometry of Venus, the pentagonal star pattern Venus traces every 8 years

symbols.name: Mimbres Scorpion Bowl
symbols.meaning: Scorpion — Scorpio sting, Pluto's domain, the death that transforms
symbols.astronomical_alignment: Pluto-Mars square — deadly leverage, the scorpion strikes when planets war

symbols.name: Mesa Verde Sun Temple
symbols.meaning: D-shaped temple with no doorways — pure astronomical observatory, not dwelling
symbols.astronomical_alignment: Sun Temple aligned to both summer solstice sunset AND winter solstice sunrise

symbols.name: Cliff Palace
symbols.meaning: Largest cliff dwelling in North America — 150 rooms, 23 kivas, sheltered in alcove facing south-southwest
symbols.astronomical_alignment: 23 kivas may encode the 23.5° axial tilt. South-facing alcove captures winter sun for heating

symbols.name: Casa Grande (Great House)
symbols.meaning: Four-story adobe structure with port holes aligned to equinox and solstice observations
symbols.astronomical_alignment: Circular port holes align with equinox sunset, and the lunar standstill rising point

symbols.name: Montezuma Well
symbols.meaning: Natural sinkhole — the emergence point, where the People came from the world below
symbols.astronomical_alignment: The Sipapuni — emergence from the third to the fourth world. The well reflects the sky perfectly, becoming a mirror telescope

symbols.name: Solar Spiral Petroglyph
symbols.meaning: Spiral petroglyph found at dozens of Mogollon sites — encodes the 18.6-year lunar cycle
symbols.site: Various sites along Gila River, NM/AZ
symbols.astronomical_alignment: Spiral arm count often = 18 or 19, encoding the 18.6-year lunar standstill cycle

symbols.name: Sunburst Petroglyph
symbols.meaning: Radiant sun with ray lines — marks solstice observation points across the Southwest
symbols.astronomical_alignment: Sun-Venus conjunction at solstice — maximum solar energy combined with Venus beauty

symbols.name: Star Beings Petroglyph
symbols.meaning: Humanoid figures with star heads — the Kachina ancestors from the Pleiades
symbols.astronomical_alignment: Jupiter-Saturn sextile — the great teachers arrive when the two great planets harmonize

symbols.name: Medicine Wheel (Bighorn)
symbols.meaning: 28 spokes radiating from central cairn — lunar month, aligned to solstice and star risings
symbols.astronomical_alignment: 28 spokes = 28-day lunar month. Cairns align to summer solstice sunrise and the rising of Aldebaran, Rigel, Sirius

symbols.name: Sipapu (Kiva Emergence Hole)
symbols.meaning: Small hole in the kiva floor — the portal to the world below, the point of emergence into this world
symbols.site: Found in every Ancestral Puebloan kiva
symbols.astronomical_alignment: The zenith tube — when the sun passes directly overhead, light enters the sipapu. Sun-Pluto trine = ancestral connection

symbols.name: Mimbres Butterfly Bowl
symbols.meaning: Butterfly transformation — the soul emerging after death, painted on bowls placed over the dead
symbols.astronomical_alignment: Venus-Mars trine — beauty emerging from conflict, the butterfly from the chrysalis

symbols.name: Supernova Petroglyph (SN 1054)
symbols.meaning: Crescent Moon + Star — records the Crab Nebula supernova of July 4, 1054 CE, visible in daylight for 23 days
symbols.astronomical_alignment: Moon near Venus when supernova exploded — recorded as crescent + bright star. Moon-Uranus conjunction = sudden cosmic revelation

symbols.name: Gila Cliff Dwellings
symbols.meaning: Five natural caves with 40 rooms — south-facing alcoves capture winter solstice sunlight deep into the caves
symbols.site: Gila Cliff Dwellings, Silver City, NM
symbols.astronomical_alignment: 5 caves at specific elevations may encode Venus's 5-pointed cycle (5 inferior conjunctions in 8 years)

symbols.name: Mimbres Turtle Bowl
symbols.meaning: Turtle carries the world — the Turtle Island creation story, patience and foundation
symbols.astronomical_alignment: Saturn-Jupiter trine — the slow giants in harmony, patience rewarded, structural growth

symbols.name: Mimbres Crane Bowl
symbols.meaning: Sandhill crane in flight — the traveller between worlds, seasonal migration encoded
symbols.astronomical_alignment: Mercury-Saturn sextile — the messenger meets structure, disciplined communication
